channel.title: Machine Learning on Art & Articles by Emin Mahrt
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Art & Articles by Emin Mahrt

item.title: microgpt.py (Karpathy) — Part 2: shapes at every step + a tiny forward pass
item.description: Exact vector/matrix shapes through embeddings, attention, MLP, logits, loss, and how caching keys/values grows with time. Plus a tiny numeric toy forward pass.

item.title: microgpt.py (Karpathy) — the code in plain English, line by line
item.description: A mom-readable walkthrough of Andrej Karpathy’s dependency-free GPT training script — every line translated to plain English.
